attributes.action: Ban The Use of Ultrasonic ' mosquito '  noise repellent devices in public areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more Mosquito ultrasonic devices  considered to tackle rowdy youths and deter teenagers with a high-pitched noise are being considered for sites all over the country. This does not solve the problem either moves the problem to a different area and does not get to the root causes also affects law abiding children walking past.  We treat vermin with these devices don't let them treat our children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
